column22: level item bounding box (0, 0, w, h)
column23: Texture Positions for level item (x1, y1, w1, h1, x2, y2, w2, h2, …)
column29: slot 1 (the first entry is the type (elemental, twilight, necromancy, divine, illusion) and after this, the 0 and 1 show if there is a modifier for this type (strength, duration, range, speed, damage, count, reflect)
